name: Gancho Bond
description:
Collect the golden chalice in a cave in the desert.

You only have your trusted grappling hook to reach high places and use it to kill enemies and move the elements to combine them to create new elements.

This was made for GMTK Game Jam 2021 (in 48 hours) and the theme was "Joined Together".

Also if you get stuck at the Earth element puzzle, don't forget to use the right mouse button.

Desert Tileset by VEXED.

Sound effects mostly downloaded from FreeSound.

Game Made with GameMaker: Studio 2.
